description:

statusTrace:
order_history1 = {'from': 1604328380, 'to': 1604328396}

    @allure.title("Запрос getordershistory: проверка работы - перечень")
    @allure.severity('blocker')
    @pytest.mark.smoke
    def test_getordershistory_2(order_history1):
        """
        Описание шагов:
            Setup: создаём аккаунты 100, 101
                - Пополняем баланс
                - Вбрасываем котировку
                - Устанавливаем пендинг
                - Вбрасываем котировку, которой активируем пендинг.
            Тест:
                Шаг1: отправляем запрос getordershistory
                Шаг2: Проверяем ответ
            Tear down:
                - Удаление аккаунтов
    
        """
        with allure.step('Запрос getordershistory'):
            getordershistory_1 = wik5.request(wik_mt5_addr, 'getordershistory', **{'logins': "100;101", 'from': order_history1['from'], 'to': order_history1['to']})
        # Данные для отчёта: stdout
        print("Ответ на запрос getordershistory: ", getordershistory_1)
        with allure.step('Проверка ответа'):
>           assert '0.7' == getordershistory_1['size'][0]["activation_price"] and '0.8'== getordershistory_1['size'][0]['price_order'] \
                    and '0.08'== getordershistory_1['size'][0]['price_sl'] and '1.8'== getordershistory_1['size'][0]['price_tp'] \
                    and '100' == getordershistory_1['size'][0]['volume_initial'] and '200' == getordershistory_1['size'][1]['volume_initial'] \
                    and 'EURUSD' == getordershistory_1['size'][0]['symbol'] and '100' == getordershistory_1['size'][0]['login'] \
                    and '0.7' == getordershistory_1['size'][1]["activation_price"] and '0.85' == getordershistory_1['size'][1]['price_order'] \
                    and '0.07' == getordershistory_1['size'][1]['price_sl'] and '1.9' == getordershistory_1['size'][1]['price_tp']
E           AssertionError: assert ('0.7' == '0.7'
E               0.7 and '0.8' == '0.8'
E               0.8 and '0.08' == '0.08'
E               0.08 and '1.8' == '1.8'
E               1.8 and '100' == '100'
E               100 and '200' == '100'
E             - 100
E             + 200)
